title: Dalmia Nisus Finance exits from Puravankara’s Chennai project - Economic Times
content: Dalmia Nisus Finance exits from Puravankara’s Chennai project  Economic Times
description: Dalmia Nisus has had invested in the project through its Real Estate Credit Opportunities Fund – I (RECOF – I) in October 2020. The entire investment was repaid by Puravankara after it sold 100% of its stake in the subsidiary companies to a third party.
